title: Discover Your Inner Animal Side!
description: Answer the following 7 questions by selecting one option for each. At the end, we'll reveal which animal matches your personality!

questions.question: 1. What's your favorite way to spend a weekend?

options.A: Curled up with a good book at home.
options.D: Trying out a new hobby or class.

questions.question: 2. Which snack appeals to you the most?

options.A: A warm cup of tea and biscuits.
options.B: A protein bar on the go.

questions.question: 3. Pick a color that resonates with you:

options.A: A cozy cabin in the mountains.
options.C: A vibrant city full of nightlife.
options.D: An ancient temple in a remote area.

options.A: Analyze and plan carefully before acting.
options.B: Dive in headfirst and adapt as you go.
options.C: Rally others to tackle it together.
options.D: Think outside the box for unique solutions.

options.A: Reading or writing in a quiet place.
options.D: Visiting a museum or art gallery.

A.title: The Wise Owl
A.description: You are thoughtful and introspective. Like the owl, you value knowledge and enjoy peaceful environments.

B.title: The Adventurous Tiger
B.description: Bold and energetic, you love excitement and embrace challenges head-on.

C.title: The Social Dolphin
C.description: Friendly and charismatic, you thrive in social settings and enjoy being surrounded by others.

D.title: The Mysterious Phoenix
D.description: Creative and unconventional, you're always reinventing yourself and exploring new horizons.
